description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Classic line-trapping action with a wealth of new options. Choose from a variety of game modes, including territories, trapper, and tail-biter games. Challenge friends and AI players in each of the multiplayer maps, or try to beat your high score in single-player survival mode!
description.short: Classic line-trapping action with a wealth of new options. Choose from a variety of game modes, including territories, trapper, and tail-biter games. Challenge friends and AI players in each of the multiplayer maps, or try to beat your high score in single-player survival mode!
